title: Restore currency display to USD ($) throughout the app

requirements.text: Replace all British Pound (£) currency symbols and GBP formatting with US Dollar ($) formatting throughout the frontend. Every place that displays a monetary value — product prices, cart totals, order totals, checkout summaries, analytics revenue figures, and any other price display — must use the USD locale format (e.g., '$12.99') consistently.

quotes: the dollar amount has chaged from usd to pound i need it back on usd please

acceptanceCriteria: All product prices on the ProductsPage, ProductCard, and ProductDetailPage display with '$' prefix.
Cart page totals and line-item prices display in USD ($).
Checkout page order summary shows USD ($) amounts.
Admin analytics revenue figures display in USD ($).
Order cards (MyOrderCard, OrderList) show per-line and total amounts in USD ($).
No '£' symbol appears anywhere in the application.

constraints: Do not change any backend data or pricing logic — this is a display-only fix.
Do not modify any files under frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or frontend/src/components/ui.
nonGoals: Adding multi-currency support or currency switching.
Changing any backend price storage or calculation logic.
Modifying any feature unrelated to currency display.
